short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot in Google Streetview without the navigation elements in the way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to take screenshots of your browser's current page with the click of a button. When in Google Maps or Streetview, the navigation elements will be automatically hidden when taking a screenshot.
